instructions: With motor running, drop garlic cloves into food processor. Add BUSH'S BEST Great Northern Beans, lime juice and olive oil, and puree until smooth. Add basil, thyme, salt and pepper, and pulse until incorporated and herbs are coarsely chopped.
ingredients: 2 (15.8 ounce) cans BUSH'S® Great Northern Beans, rinsed and drained
title: BUSH'S® Fresh Herb Bean Spread
